updatesBanner.heading: FortiSOAR v7.4.3: Introducing Fortinet Advisor for AI-Enhanced Security Orchestration
updatesBanner.description: FortiSOAR has unveiled its latest release, version 7.4.3, featuring groundbreaking innovations aimed at enhancing user experience and efficiency. One notable introduction is the Fortinet Advisor, currently in its preview version, serving as an AI assistant tailored for FortiSOAR users and compatible with version 7.4.3 and later.

updatesBanner.heading: FortiSOAR Rapid Development Kit v2.0.0 Release Announcement
updatesBanner.description: We are delighted to introduce FortiSOAR Rapid Development Kit (RDK) Version 2.0.0, bringing a myriad of user-centric enhancements to empower your journey in creating seamless third-party integrations and utility code snippets for FortiSOAR.

updatesBanner.heading: GDPR Article 33 Notification with FortiSOAR GDPR Framework Solution Pack
updatesBanner.description: The GDPR Framework solution pack serves as a valuable resource for organizations striving to comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) guidelines.
